revised_title: Observations on the Gastric Glands and Contraction in the Human Stomach
tldr: The author examines the gastric glands and contraction in the human stomach, providing detailed observations on their structure and function. They discuss the importance of these findings in understanding the physiology and pathology of the stomach, and present a case of a permanent contraction that may have caused a woman's death.
